data.title: OOO "ZAMAN": owners, founders, management, details(TIN 0276934833)
meta_keywords: Unified State Register of Legal Entities
data.meta_description: Detailed information about OBSHCHESTVO S OGRANICHENNOI OTVETSTVENNOSTIU "ZAMAN" from official sources (Federal Tax Service, Ministry of Finance, Russian State Statistics Service, etc.).
data.text:
The organization OBSHCHESTVO S OGRANICHENNOI OTVETSTVENNOSTIU "ZAMAN" was registered in the Unified State Register of Legal Entities 6 years ago 3 August 2018.

The average age of liquidated legal entities for the type of activity 49.41 "Activities of road freight transport" is 4 years. This organization existed for a shorter period of time.

Status in the Unified State Register of Legal Entities: liquidation of a legal entity (06/03/2020).

The tax authority where the legal entity was registered: Mezhraionnaia inspektsiia Federalnoi nalogovoi sluzhby № 33 po Respublike Bashkortostan (inspection code – 0277). The tax authority before 11/14/2019 – Mezhraionnaia inspektsiia Federalnoi nalogovoi sluzhby № 2 po Respublike Bashkortostan (code 0276).

Registration with the Pension Fund: registration number 002873122768 dated 18 November 2019.

Registration with the Social Insurance Fund: registration number 020100550802011 dated 6 August 2018.

OOO "ZAMAN" is registered at 450065, Republic Of Bashkortostan, Ufa, ul. Dmitriia Donskogo, 83, pomeshch. 68. (show on a map)

Before 05/28/2020 the organization was located at .

There are no other active organizations at the current legal address. However, the following organizations were previously registered here: (liquidated 06/16/2021), OOO "KATAV KARER" (before address change 12/20/2022), (liquidated 10/20/2021)

The head of the organization (a person who has the right to act on behalf of a legal entity without a power of attorney) since 9 December 2019 is liquidator Raevskaia Alina Gavrilovna (TIN: 27402363930).

Raevskaia Alina Gavrilovna is the head of 7 more organizations

OOO "SPAREKS"

OOO TSD "VOLGAURAL"

OOO "TEKHNOSTROI"

OOO "UZKD"

According to the to the tax service criteria, this is a sign of a mass director.

Previously the organization was managed by (director from 08/03/2018 until 12/09/2019 ).
